document_data.mainbody:
Mayor Whimblesnort, was a gnome who lived in Purfbin Doogricks home burrow in the 14 century DR.
Mayor Whimblesnort was in attendance at her burrows annual New Harvest Festival sometime before the . However, that years event turned disastrous with the help of aspiring inventor Purfbin Doogrick. The Chief Cook Bitty Bitterbreath was convinced to let Purfbin present his latest and greatest invention, the Shred-o-Matic 1000, to the adoring crowd of the burrows important guests. The young gnome lost control of the apparatus, and instead of shredding a mountain of potatoes for the famed Harvest Stew, it moved to shred guests. Mayor Whimblesnorts new silk hat was the first casualty of the rampage.
